alert.note: Alert for Cass; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Norman, northeastern Cass and southeastern Traill Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Perley, or 19 miles north of Fargo, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Halstad, Hendrum, Shelly, Grandin, Perley and Gardner. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 82 and 107. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
